welcome_message_body: Welcome to Rio Rancho, where the natural beauty of the surrounding landscape meets the vibrant charm of the city. Enjoy our wide-open spaces, stunning sunsets, and friendly atmosphere as you explore all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fried chicken joint located in Rio Rancho.
restaurants.address: 1058 Unser Blvd SE (at Southern Blvd SE), Rio Rancho, NM 87124

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albuquerque International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Sunport Terminal
terminals.description: The Sunport Terminal at Albuquerque International Airport is dedicated to Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
